function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of evidence on the impact of community-based approaches on epidemiological trends and cost-effectiveness","Impact":"Inability to assess the effectiveness of community-based approaches and make informed decisions","Mitigation":"Conducting research to gather evidence on the impact and cost-effectiveness of community-based approaches","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for epidemiological research","People":"Health authorities, program planners, and researchers","Owner":"Research organizations and health authorities"},{"Description":"Challenges in enacting mitigation efforts in the absence of epidemics and high numbers of human cases","Impact":"Difficulty in prioritizing and implementing mitigation efforts when the threat is not immediate","Mitigation":"Developing proactive strategies for mitigation and preparedness, conducting scenario-based planning","Technologies":"Risk modeling and simulation tools, scenario planning software","People":"Government officials, public health experts, and emergency response teams","Owner":"Government agencies and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Need for capacity building at multiple levels for effective community-based interventions","Impact":"Inability to effectively implement community-based interventions due to lack of skills and resources","Mitigation":"Training programs, skill development initiatives, and collaborative learning opportunities","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, virtual training modules, and knowledge sharing tools","People":"Community organizations, field staff, and program planners","Owner":"Health organizations and community development agencies"}]}
